properties.body:
EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. VESSEL TREKKER II, EIGHT PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
   AND CREW ABANDONING SHIP IN 30-09.10S 010-12.14E.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
   LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
   MRCC CAPE TOWN, E-MAIL: MARITIMERADIO@IXMAIL.CO.ZA,
   MRCC.CT@SAMSA.ORG.ZA.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 28/17.
